# Information for generating multiple TDOSE setup files 
# The setupfiles are then generated by running the current file with tdose_utilities.duplicate_setup_template()
# 
# setupname                          data_cube                                                           cube_extension   variance_cube                                                         variance_extension   ref_image                                                                                 img_extension  wht_image                                                                                       wht_extension     source_catalog                                                                                         sourcecat_IDcol  sourcecat_xposcol  sourcecat_yposcol  sourcecat_racol  sourcecat_deccol   sourcecat_fluxcol      sourcecat_parentIDcol               models_directory   cutout_directory   spec1D_directory   model_cutouts  cutout_sizes                                                      model_image_ext   model_param_reg       model_image_cube_ext         source_model  gauss_guess                                                                                                   gauss_guess_idcol  gauss_guess_racol  gauss_guess_deccol  gauss_guess_aimg  gauss_guess_bimg  gauss_guess_angle  gauss_guess_fluxscale  gauss_guess_fluxfactor  gauss_guess_Nsigma          max_centroid_shift  galfit_directory     galfit_model_extension       modelimg_directory            modelimg_extension          aperture_size                                                     psf_type  psf_FWHM_evolve  psf_FWHMp0  psf_FWHMp1   psf_FWHMp2    psf_savecube  nondetections    ignore_radius  model_cube_layers  model_cube_optimizer  model_cube_ext   residual_cube_ext         source_model_cube_ext     sources_to_extract            spec1D_name               plot_generate  plot_1Dspec_ext  plot_1Dspec_xrange  plot_1Dspec_yrange    plot_1Dspec_shownoise  plot_S2Nspec_ext  plot_S2Nspec_xrange  plot_S2Nspec_yrange
